message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that holds significant value. While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1500000. This is a price point that reflects the potential value I see in this product. I believe it can be even more valuable in your hands. Consider this a chance to make a significant investment. Let me know your thoughts.
